Name: Crusade Loot
Description: Loot obtained when personal points reach a certain stage in the World Boss Crusade event, and you can randomly obtain one of the items upon opening.
Description$english: Loot obtained when personal points reach a certain stage in the World Boss Crusade event, and you can randomly obtain one of the items upon opening.
Description2$english: Because it is full of uncertainty, it makes people look forward to the moment of opening it.
